resources.string:
"Welcome to my donation application."
"

My name is M Atif Ali and I am a professional electrical engneer, in Pakistan."
"

Programming is a hobby of me." "Throughout the years, I have learned many different skills." "I started on websites, then moved to linux embedded platforms, and am now doing Android development." "I have started working on Android custom ROMs based on AOSP."
"

Here is my another Android-related project" "
- Trendy WhatsApp Stickers"
"

Now I, as everyone else, have only a limited amount of time and money." "Android development is my hobby and I do it for fun and timepass."
"

If you wish to contact me," "Click on the three dots in the top right corner of the screen." "There you can select either Telegram or E-mail as the means to reach me." "I do read my e-mails almost daily, but if you have something urgent I recommend using Telegram."
"

Thanks!" "
M Atif Ali"
Here you can send me a donation if you want to.
